stories.text: write code that is reusable, maintainable and organized, so that the application can scale, and make it easier for the other developers to work on
work on complex codebase, so that I can learn and improve upon.
develop, test, and ensure that the product I contribute to is at its best quality so that my client is satisfied.
constantly growing technically and professionally so that one day I can lead a team and be in charge of awesome projects
create environment where people feel safe and fun, so that everybody can flourish, productive, and grow
have work-life balance so that I can spend time doing what I love, with people I love
make meaningful contribution and help improve various aspects of our society so that everybody can live peacefully and happily
ensure my cats have the best life possible!
